textBeforeTable: ACC-99D Decoder  38 mm Depth: 46 mm Width: 92 mm Height: ICD-400, 600 12.7 mm Depth: 38 mm Width: 92 mm Height: ICD-100, 200, ICD-SEN Models The ACC-99D starts with the ACC controller and adds all of its advanced features plus the benefits of a two-wire decoder system. Includes all features of the ACC controller, plus decoder operations.
textAfterTable: ACC-99D Model Chart Decoder Modules (Specify Separately) Decoder Model Description ICD-100 Single-station decoder with surge suppression and ground wire ICD-200 2-station decoder with surge suppression and ground wire ICD-400 4-station decoder with surge suppression and ground wire ICD-600 6-station decoder with surge suppression and ground wire ICD-SEN 2-input sensor decoder with surge suppression and ground wire Note: Each decoder includes 2 waterproof connectors for red and blue wires.
